alert.note: Alert for Howard; Mitchell (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 8:58PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Mitchell, northwestern Howard, southeastern Mower and western Fillmore Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 857 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Osage, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Riceville around 910 PM CDT. Le Roy around 920 PM CDT. Spring Valley around 935 PM CDT. Preston and Wykoff around 940 PM CDT. Fountain around 945 PM CDT. Chatfield around 950 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for north central and northeastern Iowa...and southeastern Minnesota.
